title: Immersive Sims and The Illusion of Choice - Part 3
description:
Part 1 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-_Lf_9GN0M
Part 2 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v0suDM-kVKE&t

In part 3 of a trilogy of videos on the illusion of choice in games, JM8 delves into the emotional decision making of Immersive Sims.

If you want to see more game design content a new Anatomy episode will release every other week, or you can subscribe to JM8s personal channel for similar content: https://www.youtube.com/c/JM8GameDesign
